title: David Rutley – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by David Rutley, the Conservative MP for Macclesfield, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
I am supporting Rishi Sunak – he has the proven track record to fight inflation, tackle cost of living pressures and bring stability to our economy. Rishi will deliver for the country once again as Prime Minister
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
